REPOSILITE_INITIAL_ADMIN_USER.description: Optional: Username for the initial Reposilite admin token. Both user and password must be set to create the token. Example: 'root'

REPOSILITE_INITIAL_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Optional: A STRONG password for the initial admin token. Both user and password must be set. Example: 'StrongSecret123!'

REPOSILITE_TITLE.description: Optional: Custom title for the Reposilite web interface. Example: 'My Company Artifacts'

REPOSILITE_DESCRIPTION.description: Optional: Custom description for the Reposilite web interface. Example: 'Private Maven repository'
REPOSILITE_DESCRIPTION.default: A lightweight, open source Maven repository manager

REPOSILITE_ACCENT_COLOR.description: Optional: Custom accent color for the UI (hex code). Example: '#FF5733'

REPOSILITE_DEBUG.description: Optional: Enable debug logging for Reposilite. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

REPOSILITE_DISABLE_SWAGGER.description: Optional: Disable the Swagger UI for the API. Set to 'true' or 'false'.

REPOSILITE_OPTS.description: Optional: Advanced - Additional raw command-line arguments for Reposilite. Use with caution. Example: '--disable-frontend'

REPOSILITE_JVM_OPTS.description: Optional: Advanced - JVM options for running Reposilite. Example: '-Xmx2g -Xms256m'
